ref: 11982 viṣuvánt ʻ supreme ʼ TS., m. ʻ a day in the middle of the year, a one -- day sacrifice ʼ AitBr., n. (m. lex.) ʻ equinox ʼ Yājñ., viṣuva -- n. (?) ʻ id. ʼ MBh. [*viṣu]
WPah. (Joshi) biśū m. ʻ the moment of the sun's reaching Aries, song sung by lowcaste people in April ʼ;
A. bihu ʻ last day of Āśvina, Pauṣa, or Caitra observed as a festival, equinoctial festival ʼ.
